# Interactive component

<a href="barchart.html">Click to see the interactive component in full size</a>

An interactive component has been made to quickly understand the motivations behind the adoption of veganism. We have analysed 10 major reasons behind the adoption of veganism namely:

- Animal Protection
- Environment
- Cost
- Health
- Religious and Spritual
- Social Influence
- Social Justice
- World Hunger
- Food Trends
- Disgust
